duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and coach Manufacturing engineers and equipment maintenance technicians to increase scientific thinking and continuous improvement capability.
Drive yield improvements and continuous process improvements.
Manage technical risks, develop and maintain risk burndown plans, and track metrics related to performance goals.
Provide guidance to engineering regarding design concepts and specification requirements to best utilize equipment and manufacturing techniques.

Employ DMAIC, Kaizen events, Gemba walks, and other methodologies to define problem statements, conduct voice of the customer/business, establish current state, identify waste, propose future state, manage stakeholders, and utilize change management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
